title: Loot (Part 2)
body:
Loot (Part 2)

---) Fire Domain Stone: An essence stone that absorbed a large amount of fire element energy and gave birth to its own conceptual energy of fire and created a mini domain inside it. By refining this stone, you can understand the mysteries of a domain which can increase your chances of creating your own domain.

"A stone that can help people in creating their domain..." Evan was stunned when he read the details of the fire domain stone.

According to information he got from Asher who already created his domain, it takes people a long amount of time to create their domain.

The first requirement to create a domain is to turn 25% of your world essence into conceptual energy. After turning 25% of your world essence into a conceptual energy, you have to work for a long time to create a domain using your understanding of conceptual energy.
